title: Introduction to Psychology 13th Edition c2013 Coon + Mitterer
description:
Introduction to Psychology: Gateways to Mind and Behavior, 13th Edition (c2013), textbook by Dennis Coon & John O. Mitterer.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://www.cengage.com/search/productOverview.do?N=16&Ntk=P_Isbn13&Ntt=9781111833633" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.cengage.com/search/productOverview.do?N=16&Ntk=P_Isbn13&Ntt=9781111833633</a>
(Passport to on-line resources not included)

CONTENTS:
---------
Introduction: The Psychology of Studying.
1. Intro to Psychology and Research Methods.
2. Brain and Behavior.
3. Human Development.
4. Sensation & Perception.
5. States of Consciousness.
6. Conditioning and Learning.
7. Memory.
8. Cognition, Language, and Creativity.
9. Intelligence.
10. Motivation and Emotion.
11. Gender and Sexuality.
12. Personality.
13. Health, Stress, and Coping.
14. Psychological Disorders.
15. Therapies.
16. Social Thinking and Social Influence.
17. Prosocial and Antisocial Behavior.
18. Applied Psychology.
Appendix: Behavioral Statistics.

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF.
